brand_voice.tone: Professional with a friendly and engaging undertone
brand_voice.sentence_style: A mix of short and punchy with longer, descriptive sentences
brand_voice.voice_consistency: Consistently active voice, with third person narrative
writing_guidelines: Maintain a balance between technical detail and accessibility
Emphasize Apple's commitment to quality and innovation
Highlight customer experiences and success stories
Use a consistent structure across platforms while adapting to the medium
